description: Riki, a purebred Akita who has undergone the harsh training required of a bear dog, is Gin`s sire. While an unweaned puppy, Gin witnesses a wounded Riki, fighting desperately against the giant bear, Akakabuto. Riki`s selfless courage challenges his son, Gin, to prove himself and match the lasting impression left by Riki. Riki embodies the samurai ideals of devotion to duty and life-in-death.
name: Riki
